_sText: My very own Aim_Ak-Colt version. I wanted to make a better version of ak-colt map, so I came with this one, it has a better theme, more "realistic" look, and there are no drops in spawn, players will spawn with the respective weapons automaticly. I think this map will fit better in a pub, because its not just a flat, boring textures, simple map. Terrorists: - AK47 - Glock - Knife Counter-Terrorists: - M4A1 - USP - Knife Extra: There is a AWP in the middle of the map, the player cannot keep it to the next round, to avoid Spawnkilling. Thanks to my bro Chiz for the Nav. file ^.^
